stInstanceAllocator< ClassType > Class Template Reference

#include <stUtil.h>

Detailed Description

template<class ClassType>
class stInstanceAllocator< ClassType >

This class template implements a generic allocator used by the stInstanceCache template. It uses the default constructor to create new classes and the delete operator to dispose them.

Author
Fabio Jun Takada Chino (chino.nosp@m.@icm.nosp@m.c.usp.nosp@m..br)
Marcos Rodrigues Vieira (mrvie.nosp@m.ira@.nosp@m.icmc..nosp@m.usp..nosp@m.br)
Version
1.0
Warning
There are classes which this concept is not suitable.
